UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile in the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user profile.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile photo.

emailVerified.description: Whether the user's email address has been verified.

creationTime.description: Timestamp indicating when the user profile was created.

lastSignInTime.description: Timestamp indicating when the user last signed in.

isSuspended.description: Indicates if the user account is suspended.

isAdmin.description: Indicates if the user has administrative privileges.

skillTreeGenerations.description: Count of skill tree generations for the current day.

lastGenerationDate.description: The date of the last skill tree generation, in ISO 8601 format.

paymentStatus.description: The user's current payment verification status.

premiumUntil.description: Timestamp indicating when the user's premium access expires.

subscriptionStatus.description: The status of the user's subscription.

Subscription.title: Subscription
Subscription.description: Represents a user's subscription status and details.

isCancelled.description: Indicates if the subscription has been cancelled.

Subject.title: Subject
Subject.description: Represents a subject or topic for organizing notes.

description.description: A brief description of the subject.

isImportant.description: Indicates if the subject is marked as important.

Note.title: Note
Note.description: Represents a single note within a subject.

blocks.description: The content blocks of the note.

isImportant.description: Indicates if the note is marked as important.

ExamQuestion.title: ExamQuestion
ExamQuestion.description: Represents an exam question paper, practice question, or syllabus item.

title.description: The title of the exam question or syllabus item.

blocks.description: The content blocks of the item.

isImportant.description: Indicates if the item is marked as important.

Resource.title: Resource
Resource.description: Represents a supplementary resource file or link.

blocks.description: The content blocks of the resource.

isImportant.description: Indicates if the resource is marked as important.

tags.description: A list of tags for the resource.

StickyNote.title: StickyNote
StickyNote.description: Represents a short, sticky note on the dashboard.

title.description: The title of the sticky note.

content.description: The content of the sticky note.

color.description: The background color of the note.

Notification.title: Notification
Notification.description: Represents a notification for a user.

isRead.description: Whether the user has read the notification.

href.description: A URL to link to when the notification is clicked.

SiteConfig.title: SiteConfig
SiteConfig.description: Stores site-wide configuration and feature flags.

siteWideMaintenance.description: Puts the entire site into maintenance mode.

stickyNotesWip.description: Puts the Sticky Notes page into maintenance.

generateWip.description: Puts the Generate page into maintenance.

notesWip.description: Puts the Notes page into maintenance.

analyzeWip.description: Puts the Analyze page into maintenance.

accountWip.description: Puts the Account page into maintenance.

skillTreeWip.description: Puts the Skill Tree feature into maintenance.

premiumStyleAnalysis.description: Feature flag for premium style analysis.

dailySkillTreeLimit.description: Daily skill tree generation limit. -1 for unlimited.

PaymentVerification.title: PaymentVerification
PaymentVerification.description: Represents a user's payment that requires manual verification.

id.description: Unique identifier for the verification request.

userId.description: The ID of the user who made the payment.

userName.description: The name submitted by the user for payment.

userEmail.description: The email of the user for easy reference.

utr.description: The UTR/Transaction ID submitted by the user.

submittedAt.description: Timestamp when the request was submitted.

Broadcast.title: Broadcast
Broadcast.description: Represents a broadcast message sent to all users.

message.description: The content of the broadcast message.

href.description: A URL to link to when the notification is clicked.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.

definition.description: Stores subscription information for each user.

params.description: The unique identifier of the user.

params.name: subscriptionId
params.description: The unique identifier of the subscription.
